comments.body: Maybe it's worth to mention the potential drawbacks of this approach? Like the chance of missing file events if those directories are created after?

I believe the cases the current approach will fail are rare enough that it won't make a difference to mention it here. The general troubleshooting advice "Run 'connect to build server'" fixes this issue along with other similar issue (that we're not aware of).
